targets.expr:
(sum(irate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload) uimp_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload) uimp_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload"}) by (pod))

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload) uimp_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload"}) by (pod))

group_left(workload) uimp_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload"}) by (pod))
